1176140.name: MixPad
1176140.description:
MixPad multi-track recording and mixing software has all the power of professional recording and mixing equipment in a single program.


Start mixing your audio projects today. Whether a novice or professional, MixPad has the strength to create breathtaking audio and is designed with an easy-to-use and intuitive interface to allow you to edit your tracks in a matter of minutes. Record audio in the program or drag and drop your prerecorded files. Mix an unlimited number of tracks and add exciting effects. You can upload your mixes directly online to SoundCloud, Google Drive, or DropBox.

Multitrack Editing Features

  • Easily make basic edits such as trim, split, join and more
  • Add audio effects including distortion, compression, reverb and more
  • Supports all popular audio formats including wav, mp3, aif, wma, vox, m4a, gsm and many more
  • Record MIDI tracks from MIDI devices or upload prerecorded MIDI files
  • Includes a royalty-free sound effect and music library
  • Use Beat Maker to craft your owns beats or find a sample beat
  • VST plugin support - add thousands of studio effects and instruments
  • Export at all popular bit depths up to 32 bits floating point audio
  • Mix an unlimited number of audio, music, sounds, and voice tracks
  • Load any audio file; more supported formats than any other mixer.
  • Mix to MP3, burn to CD or upload your productions

What Can You Do With MixPad?

  • Create music for your game designs
  • Use our mixing software to smothly combine music
  • Record single or multiple audio tracks simultaneously
